## Bio

Hi! I'm an third-year undergrad student at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China ([UESTC](https://en.uestc.edu.cn)) and University of Glasgow ([UofG](https://www.gla.ac.uk)). I majored in electronic and communication engineering (ECE). 

**I'm looking for a PhD position in wireless communication or ML in 2026**, I love axiomatic thinking and innovation. See my CV [here](cv).

On this site I also keep a partial list of [blogs](blog.html), which is still actively updating.
